questions.question: How do you take a number to some power? Math.___( )
questions.description: Math.pow( ) will take a number to some power. An example is Math.pow(2, 3) will equal 8.

questions.question: How do you find a square root of some number? Math.____( )
questions.description: Math.sqrt( ) will give you the square root of a number. An example is Math.sqrt(4) will return 2.

questions.question: Math.random( ) will return a number between 0 and...
questions.description: Math.random( ) returns a number between 0 and 1, such as .229375290430.

questions.question: How do you force a number to round down? Math._____( )
questions.description: Math.floor( ) will round a number down. An example is Math.floor(4.75) will return 4.

questions.question: How do you force a number to round up? Math.____( )
questions.description: Math.ceil( ) will round a number up. An example is Math.ceil(8.1) will return 9.

questions.question: What type is true?
questions.description: Both true and false are booleans. An example is (2 < 9) would return true.

questions.question: What function makes a string uppercase? .__________( )
questions.description: .Uppercase( ); is used to make a string uppercase. An example is "hi".toUppercase( ) will return HI.

questions.question: What function removes and returns the last element in an array? .___( )
questions.description: .pop( ) removes and returns the last element in an array.

questions.question: What function adds an element to the end of an array? .____( )
questions.description: .push( ) adds an element to the end of an array.

questions.question: What function removes and returns the first element of an array? ._____( )
questions.description: .shift( ) removes and returns the first element of an array.

questions.question: What function adds an element to the beginning of an array? ._______( )
questions.description: .unshift( ) adds an element to the beginning of an array.

questions.question: What function allows you to concatenate two arrays together? .______( )
questions.description: .concat( ) allows you to concatenate two arrays together.

questions.question: What function allows you to return a copy of a portion of an array? ._____( )
questions.description: .slice( ) allows you to return a copy of a portion of an array.

questions.question: What function allows you to alter an array by adding or removing elements? ._____( )
questions.description: .splice( ) allows you to alter an array by adding or removing elements.

questions.question: What function allows you to reverse an array? ._______( )
questions.description: .reverse( ) allows you to reverse an array.

questions.question: What function allows you to sort the elements in an array? .____( )
questions.description: .sort( ) allows you to sort the elements in an array.

questions.question: What function allows you to take an array and combine the elements together as a string? .____( )
questions.description: .join( ) allows you to take an array and join the elements together as a string.
